other_title: アッセンブル・インサート (Japanese)
plot: A criminal group known as Demon Seed terrorizes Tokyo with its vast armies of mecha. The local police is afraid to confront them, but one person stands in their way: Maron Namikaze, a 13-year-old idol singer with a catchy voice and unbelievable superhuman strength.
ending_theme: "Amairo no Yume no Tsubo" (あま色の夢のつぼ) by Hiroko Kasahara (ep 2)
